guide.item: Enter the result of examination / inspection about the declaration. A: Permission X: Disapproval

In case Customs officials required more documents for verification, enter the information of the documents (e.g.) - Through traffic permits/grant (valid) - Transport means registration license - Driving license - List of passenger - Other

This field is used for following purpose; - Examiner's comments for additional declaration to changing driver - Examiner's comments for additional declaration to extension to stay - Examiner's comments for the other issue.
In case there is violation minutes, enter "1"
This field is used for following purpose; - Inspector's comments for inspection - Inspector's comments for violation minutes - Inspector's comments for the other issue.
